'''Three's Too Many''' is a [[Badges|badge]] that can be obtained by playing the mission [[John's Revenge (Ch. 2)]] on the island of [[Angler's Grave]].

Objective: <big style="color:yellow">Finish the mission with less than three crewmates in your team.</big>
